title: Underground Brooklyn Walking Brewery Tour
description: Visit three world-class breweries on this all-inclusive 3.5 hour craft beer experience through Brooklyn. Ranked as one of the top beer cities in the country, indulge your taste buds as we give you a backstage pass to some of NYC's hippest breweries & neighborhoods. A complimentary snack is included, as well as subway transportation to the breweries.

title: The Story of Brooklyn Heights Tour
description: In this tour, you will be told from a resident of Brooklyn Heights a compressed and almost storyline version of the four hundred years of Brooklyn. This tour breaks down those four hundred years into four epochs, the colonial era, the suburban era, the fall of Brooklyn Heights, and its rebirth. The tour guide may also point to different restaurants to try out along the way.

title: Private Brooklyn Bridge Tour with a Local
description:
Everyone else comes to the Bridge to take a photo and move on. Not us - we'll understand the huge effort that went in to getting the Bridge built, the lives lost and made, the scandals and celebrations. It's such a beautiful bridge but even better when you understand how it came to be.

In many ways the story of New York is the story of the Brooklyn Bridge. Almost nothing you see in the City existed before the Bridge - we'll use the Bridge as a way to understand the City that rose around it - the buildings, the other bridges, the transportation system, the people. 

And then there are all the fun stories that span 140 years. We'll have a jam packed 90 minutes exploring the bridge, the city, and their history.

title: Brooklyn Heights, Brooklyn Bridge, and DUMBO Food Tour
description:
Explore and learn about this historic and lively borough with a guided walk through some of the best of Brooklyn: Brooklyn Heights, Brooklyn Promenade + Park and DUMBO. This tour offers spectacular vistas of the Statue of Liberty, the Manhattan skyline and the majestic Brooklyn Bridge.

And the best part is we will see it all while enjoying popular local food: Juliana’s pizza (same owner, same pizza next door to Grimaldi’s pizza), Jaques Torres Chocolate, One Girl Cookie and more! 

Know that you are making a difference by simply choosing our tours; we offer guests a way to give back to the community, by engaging with our social impact partners. By adding a social impact partner to each food tour, we've created a unique experience for you and assure that every tour we run is having a direct positive impact on the community we'll be exploring. 

This tour is Vegetarian friendly. Gluten Free & Vegan currently unavailable for this tour.

title: Rockaway Beach Bus in New York City
description:
Support a rebuilding scene and join us for an epic day at the beach! 

Rockaway Beach is an old New York institution on the rise after surviving the devastating effects of Hurricane Sandy. We’re teaming up with some of the best brands on the NYC Summer scene to get Manhattan & Brooklyn out to Rockaway, Riis Park & Fort Tilden for a summer of fun with the best NYC beach experience in the game… 

Rent a board and get a surf lesson. Bar hop or keep it mellow and just hang on the beach, no matter what you’re into The OvR Rockaway Beach Bus has you covered!

title: Brooklyn Outdoor Escape Game: The Land of Street Art
description:
Embark on a quest around Brooklyn to discover the most beautiful street art murals and their stories, all with the help of your smartphone. Unlock new stories as you discover the local artists of Williamsburg, the fascinating New York neighborhood.

+ Discover the charming neighborhood of Williamsburg and its most beautiful street art murals
+ Uncover secrets about Street-Artists and their art from all around the world
+ Admire the Williamsburg bridge and walk along the river while looking at the Manhattan skyline
+ Walk around the most beautiful part of Brooklin
+ Try a new type of experience, the perfect mix between a tour, outdoor escape game, and treasure hunt

Discover Brooklyn, New York's famous art-centric borough, by following clues and discovering amazing stories about the astonishing graffiti work.

Each clue will lead you from one place to another, giving you exact directions, so you won't need a map, a GPS or a guide.

title: Brooklyn Scavenger Hunt: Soaring To New Heights
description: Let’s Roam is the #1 app-led scavenger hunt company. Walk to all the best landmarks and hidden gems, answering trivia questions and solving challenges. Work with your team or compete against them, as you learn new facts and create memorable experiences. Let’s Roam Scavenger Hunts are great as an everyday activity, or for bachelorette parties, birthday parties, corporate team building events and more! Each player chooses an interactive role, with challenges varying by person.

title: Art, History & Waterfront Views in DUMBO
description:
Soak up the art, food & views in one of the most beautiful and iconic parts of the city, led by local art expert and community builder, Alexandra Harper.

We will take in the unique sights, sounds and tastes that make DUMBO such a rich and amazing neighborhood, with a focus on female-owned & run businesses. We will see some of the best visual art in the city, both indoors and out, along with an exclusive private studio visit with a local artist, sampling some unique savory snacks and sweet treats along the way.

This walk features some of the most beautiful waterfront views of Manhattan, and you will learn more about how this fascinating neighborhood has grown and changed over time. It is a great opportunity to take a deep dive into one of NYC's most beautiful and fascinating neighborhoods, learn about its history and meet new friends along the way.

We will end near the East River ferry, if you would like to ride back to Manhattan with other attendees (not included in trip price).
